pr_title: DPC-848: Update CI to use Github Actions instead of Travis

timeline.message: DPC-848: Use Github Actions instead of Travis for CI
DPC-848: Use Github Actions instead of Travis for CI
DPC-848: Remove travis target from Makefile
DPC-848: No need to explicitly set .vault_password

timeline.bodyText: I'm surprised for the web app that we need Java and Python.  Ruby, yes.
timeline.author: dhgreene
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+name: "DPC CI Workflow"
+
+on: [push]
+
+env:
+  VAULT_PW: ${{ secrets.VAULT_PW }}
+  REPORT_COVERAGE: true
+  CC_TEST_REPORTER_ID: ${{ secrets.CC_TEST_REPORTER_ID }}
+
+jobs:
+  build-api:
+    name: "Build and Test API"
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: "Checkout code"
+        uses: actions/checkout@v1
+      - name: "Set up JDK 11" 
+        uses: actions/setup-java@v1
+        with:
+          java-version: '11.0.2'
+      - name: "Set up Python 3.8.1"
+        uses: actions/setup-python@v2
+        with:
+          python-version: '3.8.1'
+      - name: "API Build"
+        run: |
+          make ci-app
+  build-web:
+    name: "Build and Test Website"
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - name: "Checkout code"
+        uses: actions/checkout@v1
+      - name: "Set up JDK 11"

replies.bodyText: It was being used by the previous build system (Travis), so I left it in place.  I removed it in the latest commit, so lets see how it goes.
replies.author: msnook

timeline.message: DPC-848: Remove Java and Python from webapp build
